name: MISONR BCS Case ID
description: OAS0019 v1.0 Report to show BCS Case ID answers for the selected establishment.

dataset.name: MIS Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK = AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK (+)) AND ((AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, INITIALS, UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: BCS Case ID
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.RECEPTION_DATE, BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.INITIATION_DATE, BCS_ETHNIC_GROUP.DESCRIPTION AS ETHNIC_GROUP, BCS_SPOKEN_LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION AS PREFERRED_SPOKEN_LANGUAGE, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.INTERPRETER_REQUIRED, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.PERSIST_IND, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ARMED_FORCES_IND, CARED_FOR.DESCRIPTION AS CARED_FOR, BCS_REP_OFFENCE_LOOKUP.OFFENCE_CAT_DESCRIPTION, BCS_SENTENCE_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS SENTENCE_TYPE FROM ASSESSMENT, ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID, BCS_PART_STATUS, OFFENDER, ETHNIC_GROUP BCS_ETHNIC_GROUP, LANGUAGE BCS_SPOKEN_LANGUAGE, CARED_FOR, REP_OFFENCE_LOOKUP BCS_REP_OFFENCE_LOOKUP, BCS_SENTENCE_TYPE, REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY, PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON, ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION1 WHERE (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = ASSESSMENT.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.OFFENDER_ID (+)) AND (ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID AND ASSESSMENT.ASSESSMENT_TYPE_ELM = 'TR_BCS') AND (BCS_ETHNIC_GROUP.ETHNIC_GROUP_OPOL_ID (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ETHNIC_GROUP_OPOL_ID) AND (BCS_SPOKEN_LANGUAGE.LANGUAGE_OPOL_ID (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.PREF_SPOKEN_LANGUAGE_OPOL_ID) AND (PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PURPOSE) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.ASSESSMENT_ID = ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION1.ASSESSMENT_ID) AND (ASSESSMENT_BCS_SECTION1.OFFENCE_JOIN_KEY = BCS_REP_OFFENCE_LOOKUP.OFFENCE_HO_CODE (+)) AND (CARED_FOR.CARED_FOR_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.CARED_FOR) AND (BCS_PART_STATUS.BCS_PART_STATUS_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_PART1_STATUS) AND (BCS_SENTENCE_TYPE.BCS_SENTENCE_TYPE_CODE (+) = ASSESSMENT_BCS_CASEID.BCS_SENTENCE_TYPE) AND (SUBSTR(OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, 1, 10) = TAGMIS_CASELOAD_SECURITY((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */), OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY)) AND ((REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.LATEST_OWNERSHIP_RANK = 1) AND BCS_PART_STATUS.DESCRIPTION = 'Complete' AND REP_OFFENDER_HISTORY.PHYSICAL_LOCATION IN (SELECT LOCATION FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Physical Location:','A','Offender History\Physical Location',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND PURPOSE_OF_BCSREASON.DESCRIPTION IN ('Basic Custody Screening - Start', 'Basic Custody Screening - Review'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ASSESSMENT_ID, BCS_PART1_COMP_DATE, RECEPTION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, INITIATION_DATE, ETHNIC_GROUP, PREFERRED_SPOKEN_LANGUAGE, INTERPRETER_REQUIRED, PERSIST_IND, ARMED_FORCES_IND, CARED_FOR, OFFENCE_CAT_DESCRIPTION, SENTENCE_TYPE, COUNTDISTINCT(MIS_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY ASSESSMENT_ID = V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID) AS V_CASEID_NOMS_NUMBER, SURNAME || ', ' || INITIALS AS V_OFFENDER_SURNAME, CASE WHEN PREFERRED_SPOKEN_LANGUAGE IS NULL THEN 'Not Answered' ELSE PREFERRED_SPOKEN_LANGUAGE END AS V_CID_PREFERRED_SPOKEN_LANGU31, CASE WHEN INTERPRETER_REQUIRED = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN INTERPRETER_REQUIRED = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not answered' END END AS V_CID_INTERPRETER_REQUIRED, CASE WHEN PERSIST_IND = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN PERSIST_IND = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not answered' END END AS V_CID_PERSISTENT_OFFENDER, CASE WHEN ARMED_FORCES_IND = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE CASE WHEN ARMED_FORCES_IND = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'Not Answered' END END AS V_CID_ARMED_FORCES, CASE WHEN CARED_FOR IS NULL THEN 'Not Answered' ELSE CARED_FOR END AS V_CID_CARED_FOR FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_CASEID_NOMS_NUMBER
field.legacySql: =Count([MIS Sentence].[NOMS Number];Distinct) Where ([Assessment ID] = [v_Max Assessment ID])

field.name: $ref:V_CASEID_NOMS_NUMBER
field.legacySql: =Count([MIS Sentence].[NOMS Number];Distinct) Where ([Assessment ID] = [v_Max Assessment ID])

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE V_MAX_ASSESSMENT_ID_FOR_FILTER IN (1))

field.name: $ref:V_CID_INTERPRETER_REQUIRED
field.display: Has this offender been identified as a Prolific or other Priority Offender? (Effective September 2004)

field.name: $ref:V_CID_PERSISTENT_OFFENDER
field.display: Have they ever been a member of the armed services?

field.name: $ref:V_CID_ARMED_FORCES
field.display: Has the offender been in the care of local authority children's services at any time?

errors.error: Error: Error: Query failed: GENERIC_USER_ERROR: Failed To Get Query Passthrough Schema
